name: Asteroids Challenge
description:
Hello guys, this is a game made by me in one week for a job interview.

I received this challenge to develop a asteroids game like in one week, so the contractors can see my knowledge in programming - Such as for code structures, performances and so on.

Due the fact this game was made before I can get the job, the codes are all messy and noob, in my opinion. After my job I could learn lots of things and improved my programming skills. 

Thx
